boardgame.name: Atlantis
Dark Tower
La Tour Mystérieuse
boardgame.description: An epic fantasy quest to recover an ancient magic scepter from a tyrant king in his Dark Tower, brought to life in electronic form._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To vanquish the usurper, players search the four realms of the circular game board for three keys to unlock the tower's gate. On this journey, there are battles to be fought against roving bands of brigands, dragons, plague and hunger. There are bazaars to visit to purchase supplies and assistants for the quest. There are uncharted territories to get lost in and tombs and ruins to plunder. And there is a mighty army to be raised before the player can lay seige to the tower and fight either to glorious victory or crushing defeat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dated and primitive by today's standards, Dark Tower was nevertheless an astonishing achievement when it was released in 1981. Every aspect of the game was monitored by a small computer inside the black plastic shell of the tower itself, an unheard of innovation at the time. Players input their moves on a small membrane keypad each turn and the computer took over from there, doing everything from conducting the progress of battles to keeping track of how much (or little) food was left to feed the players' always hungry warriors. It could even play recognizable pieces of music at significant points during the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 15: The Grizzled Review - Mysterium - Catacombs - Fury of Dracula
Show #1: Jeff and Mark_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Top Ten Games
TDT - Episode # 307 - Judging a Game by It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cover

listing.notes: Box top is battered and has 4 torn corners. Rest of components are in excellent condition. Missing 4 board corner protectors and 1 red peg. Otherwise game is complete and the tower works!

Dark Tower 1981 Milton Bradley. COMPLETE with rulebook, dart tower electronic game unit (w/battery cover + red dragon flag - uses 2 D batteries), 2 two-fold gameboards, 4 cardboard score peg cards, black plastic interlock gameboard/tower piece, 16 plastic buildings (4 ea. color ruin, bazaar, tomb, sanctuary of tan, orange, dark brown, dark green), 5 plastic pawns (black dragon, 4 warriors (all different) (tan, orange, dark brown, dark green)), 4 cardboard pegasus tokens, 4 plastic flags w/decals (lion, griffin, falcon, unicorn), 12 plastic key tokens (4 ea. gold, silver, bronze), 4 white plastic gameboard corner protectors, 42 red plastic score pegs, dark tower bulb replacement kit (instructions, clear tube, bulb - OF127), warranty registration sheet. The electronic tower has been verified in 100% working condition and comes with a lifetime warranty. All pieces and parts are in like new condition. The gameboard flags that pop into the cardboard holes do not stand without the help of some rubber cement. The box is in very good condition with light wear and two split corners but includes all the original inner packing. Shipping weight is 8 pounds.
Dark Tower. Box shows wear, contents 100% complete and in great shape. Even has sealed extra bulb! Tower works perfectly. I welcome international buyers!
Dark Tower. 100% complete with working tower. Parts are in great shape. No broken corner protectors, flags, etc. - very rare. Box is pretty beat up, but repaired. I welcome international buyers!
Tower is nonfunctional.

No box! only missing 2 key pieces, one flag, 11 score pegs, and one Pegasus token. The tower and the game board in very good condition, the rule book and the four cardboard score charts has a lot of wear and tear, one of the warrior_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s weapon broke off. Comes from a non-smoking and clean environment. (PayPal accepts credit cards) Any questions just GeekMail me.
This is a private sell to Peter M. being the high bidder on a geekbay auction.

Now lowered the price! You know the game. classic 80_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s rare MB game - Dark Tower send your noble around the kingdom to collect the 3 keys; enabling you to enter the Dark Tower for the final confrontation. Game in very good condition. One piece missing - one of the player pawns, altho i beleive these are relatively easy to locate. Weve just been using a pawn from another game as it in no way alters the gameplay. Board in good condition, as are all of the other playing pieces. Included are the plastic, card peg holders, which not all versions seem to have. The box has seen better days but is still in useable condition, just taped up where needed. Ivev marked this as Very Good even tho one piece is missing because aside from that it is in very good condition. Manual and rules are of course included. Any questions, please mail me
This is an auction sale for silverfalcon43. I will only accept purchase from him. Dark Tower + Red Dragon Inn

Dark Tower Milton Bradley 1981 Not complete. Tower turns on, but motor doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t turn. Batteries not included. Includes tower, manual, board, plastic interlock pieces for board, 16 buildings, 3 of the 4 warriors (missing the black one), dragon, 11 of 12 keys (missing one white), none of the 5 flags, 36 of 42 score pegs, 4 corner protectors, 4 score charts, 4 Pegasus tokens, the remains of the label sheet, sprues from the cardboard and plastic pieces, replacement light bulb with tube, instructions for changing the light bulb, survey card, and the cardboard box inserts. Box is beat up - tape, split corners, etc.

Tower works great and was recently overhauled by a friend of mine whose business is in electronics. Box is a little torn and the game is missing a couple minor pieces, but nothing that prevents the playing or enjoyment of the game. Rules are in good shape. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d love to keep this game, but, like others I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m trying to sell today, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d love to get an Ipad more... Thanks for looking.

Game is complete except that one 1 Pegasus token is missing. I tested the tower on May 26, 2011 and it was properly working. The box has pretty crisp coloring with some edgewear and one corner of the box top is split. Box bottom is fine. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve seen a couple pretty beat up boxes for this game over the years and this one is in pretty good shape (the Dark Tower game box is problematic as the tower does not fit in the box so that you can actually close the box properly). Shipping will be $15 to Eastern and Central US and $19 to Mountain and Pacific (the high cost is due to the size of the box and the need to pack the tower separately as well). Other locations please inquire.

Dark Tower- Hasbro - Complete, including all pieces and rulebook and tower. with one broken set of board connectors, otherwise complete in very good condition in a good to very good box with one split corner. The tower works. Extra bulb included along with instructions on installing.
Working tower, top part of box split on one corner, duct taped, missing 12 red score pegs, 4 extra Pegasus tokens, will ship however the buyer wants. Feel free to make an offer.
For auction winner Goali4hire. Item will be shipped after final payment is received.
For lazzater Shipping $20 Paypal is ckoenig@gmail.com

Working tower, but game is missing a few pieces. Board and rule book included. Box is worn. INVENTORY 1 tower - fully functioning 1 cardboard game board 2 parts 1 interlock 15 buildings (missing dark brown tomb) 3 warrior pawns (missing dark brown warrior) 1 Dragon (broken at base, two parts can be repaired) 12 key pieces 5 flags (red dragon flag is broken, two parts can be repaired) 35 score pegs (6 missing, one chewed) 4 corner protectors (one broken, two parts can be repaired) 4 score cards 4 Pegasus tokens Labels applied as required Instructions booklet 1 replacement bulb and plastic cover Great for someone who wants to save a ton of cash and build a piece or two. There are other pieces of all those that need to be made.

Tower has been serviced and works. Missing 1 red peg (easily replaced - Same ones used in Battleship). Small decorative flag for top of tower broken. Both parts included, fixable with some glue. Box is worn and has splitting. Components in very good shape.

Tower is fully operational. Game is complete and in good condition except for: Missing yellow player figure Missing copper key Missing gold key Box has significant damage Manual has some wear There is some corrosion due to battery acid leak in the battery compartment. Buyer to pay shipping costs.

Listing is reserved for jmann. Dark Tower, game incomplete, missing some components. Tower lights up and spins, but is not confirmed to work in full game. Replacement bulb included. Box has some damage. Sold as is. Seller pays shipping.
All original pieces included. Great condition for how old it is.
Complete and works

Tower motor and all lights working with new batteries installed. Only missing the Dark Tower flag and two clips which do not interfere with gameplay. All figures intact, box corners have been taped, and tower insert has seen some wear but remains functional. Also included a replacement bulb. Canadian (English/French) version which includes a separate rules book in French. As well, the Dark Tower keypad overlay is bilingual.
Missing 3 edge protectors, a few red pegs, warrenty card, and lid is damaged. Everything else is there and working.
A copy of this classic game that Orson Welles gave a drunken endorsement for... In secondary shrinkwrap, preserved with some box wear and minor component wear. A time capsule of vintage Ameritrash.

Up for sale is the 1981 classic MILTON BRADLEY GAME: DARK TOWER!! THIS GAME IS IN GOOD CONDITION AND HAS 100% OF THE PLAYING PIECES WITH IT. The box is in good/fair condition, it shows some shelf wear. The tower is in good working order and tested out fine. The rule book is original. The corner pieces for the game board ORIGINAL AND UNBROKEN!!!. Pictures and can be sent to show everything is in working order. Includes an extra light bulb for the tower. The game is in good working order but due to its age is being sold as is. Please ask any questions before purchasing as I want you to be happy with your purchase. Buyer will pay for shipping costs and dictate how item ships. Payment is due within 3 days of purchase via PAY PAL.
ALL PIECES ARE PRESENT, NONE BROKEN,PLAYED TODAY TOWER IN GOOD WORKING ORDER.SHIPPING WILL BE CALCULATED BASED UPON LOCATION AND SERVICE.
The tower works well. Photos available on demand. Thanks for looking
